name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pop Adult Game
description:
Looking to play a game while stimulating your mind ? Choose Puzzle Pop !

Puzzle Pop is a relaxing and enjoyable way to spend your time. Made for challenge enthusiasts and puzzle lovers from everywhere! Just pick the number of puzzle pieces you want to challenge yourself with, and let’s go!

From abstract puzzles to real illustration's, for novices or experts, everyone will be able to find the model that suits him, in the desired theme. Architecture, landscapes, cities around the world, drawings, nature, animals,.. Puzzle Pop offers puzzles for all levels, you can vary the pleasures and escape with beautiful scenery!

Train your brain while having plain fun with hundreds of entertaining HD puzzles to solve !

Puzzle Pop offers a wide range of features, for hours of fun :

- Extended catalog: +1000 of free, diversified, high-quality puzzles
- Plenty of categories: Architecture, Road Trips, Nature, Sculptures, Animals, Mosaïc, Cities, Beaches...
- Easy to play : tap the pieces, rotate them, and complete the puzzles
- 36 to 400-pieces puzzle, either if you want to relax or challenge yourself !
- Infinite inspiration with weekly updates, so you’ll never run out of puzzles !
- Complete puzzles anywhere! no wifi needed!

https://musicworldmedia.com/products/puzzle/tos
